backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a travel booking platform, defining data types and state for destinations, travel packages, flights, bookings, blog posts, testimonials, user profiles, and contact submissions, with authorization and blob storage mixins included.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that defines the OldActor type mirroring all backend state shapes and exports a no-op `run` function for schema migration on upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the homepage restoration feature (version 28 layout) to its relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key contents of components, pages, hooks, and utilities in the React frontend.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, primary, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'Tour & Travel Air Ticket Booking Website' and mounting the app at the `#root` div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page routing via a `Page` union type, authentication state via Internet Identity, admin status, and rendering TopBar, Header, Footer, WhatsApp button, and page-specific components.
frontend/src/components/FlightSearchResu: Component that displays flight search results as cards with booking dialogs, handles authenticated booking creation via React Query mutation, and shows an empty state when no flights are found.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, social media links (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp), quick navigation links, and popular destinations list.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, desktop/mobile nav links, Internet Identity auth controls, and an admin dashboard link for admin users.
frontend/src/components/MessageSection.t: A travel enquiry form section that collects name, destination, travel date, and number of persons, then opens a pre-filled WhatsApp chat link on submission.
frontend/src/components/PackageDetailsDi: A modal dialog that displays full details of a travel package including its image, description, and price, triggered by a child element or default button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A blocking modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name, email, and phone number to create their profile via the backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: A slim top announcement bar displaying the brand tagline and a WhatsApp enquiry link with phone icon.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: A fixed floating WhatsApp contact button in the bottom-right corner that links to a pre-built WhatsApp enquiry URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for all backend actor interactions including user profiles, destinations, travel packages, flights, bookings, contacts, blog posts, testimonials, and more.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for a purple-blue travel-themed design system with light and dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page with tabbed forms for adding destinations, travel packages, and flights, plus a view of contact submissions, guarded by an admin role check.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's flight bookings with status badges and formatted dates, showing login prompts or empty states when appropriate.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with a form collecting name, destination, travel date, and number of persons, which on submission opens a pre-filled WhatsApp enquiry link.
frontend/src/pages/EnquiryPage.tsx: A travel enquiry form page that collects name, destination, travel date, and number of persons, then opens a pre-filled WhatsApp message via a generated link.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main homepage composed of multiple sections (hero, promo banner, flight search, destinations, packages, blog, testimonials) using React Query hooks and WhatsApp link utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappLinkBuilder.t: Exports two functions that build WhatsApp wa.me deep-link URLs pre-filled with enquiry or flight-search message data for a fixed phone number.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (CSS variables), fonts, border radii, shadows, spacing, animations, and enabling the animate, typography, and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for Joyguru Travels tracking schema version, existing features, and a pending action request to restore backend data records from version 28.
